name: Punch-Out!! Featuring Mr. Dream
description:
Original Release Date: August 1990

As young boxer Little Mac, players have a once-in-a-lifetime chance to
battle the big guys of the World Video Boxing Association circuit. Take
them on one by one, starting with skinny Glass Joe. Battle up through
King Hippo and all the way to the WVBA Champion himself. Players use
their best jabs, hooks, and power uppercuts to knock out opponents but
must also dodge jaw-breaking blows by paying attention to subtle changes
in their foe's body position. With great graphics, addictive action, and
a touch of humor, this game will keep players entertained for hours!
